title: WWE SummerSlam 2025 - Sunday
overview: The 2025 SummerSlam, also promoted as SummerSlam: New Jersey, was a professional wrestling event produced by WWE. It was the 38th annual SummerSlam and took place as a two-night event on August 2 and 3, 2025, at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey. This marked the first SummerSlam to be held across two nights. The event aired via pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming and featured wrestlers from the Raw and SmackDown brand divisions.
